title: Refund Credits
body: Why cant i refund some of the older purchases i make, and is it possible to earn more refund credits? I really want to refund some skins on my second account that i dont use a lot, and get some other skins, but the purchases happened last year. How do i refund these? Thanks{{champion:32}}

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, the current refund policy only allows you to refund content that was purchased in the last 90 days and requires a refund token to do so. You can view our entire refund policy [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).

If you have any questions, let me know.
You can only [refund ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ#h2)within the last 90 days of the purchase.
